block.p: Imagine my surprise when I saw my alma mater, Mount St. Mary, on the front page of Circuits because of its wireless campus network. But the Dominican sisters have always been on the cutting edge.

In the winter, we (the class of 1946) would ride sleighs down the hill in front of the main building pictured (where a student was using her laptop under a tree), and in the spring we would walk along a path bordered with lilac bushes. Such a flood of memories. You made my day.
